subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 37 points and Chauncey Billups added 29 in the Denver Nuggets’ 119-112 victory over the visiting Jazz, ending Utah’s four-game winning streak.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 37 points and Chauncey Billups added 29 in the Denver Nuggets’ 119-112 victory over the visiting Jazz, ending Utah’s four-game winning streak.
